attributes.action: Queen Elizabeth carriers should have catapults
attributes.additional_details: As is explained in http://www.theregister.co.uk/2012/04/17/f35_carriers_plot_by_bae_and_raf/, the future of the Royal Navy would be better served if the Prime Minister resisted any attempts to reverse the decision to install catapults in the new Queen Elizabeth class carriers and purchase the carrier version of the F-35 (F-35C). We, the undersigned, would like to express our opposition to such a change, and our support for the new carriers to be installed with catapults.
